question:
How to check your Facebook feed

Choices:
A: Log in to Facebook. Click on the bell shaped button at the top right of your Facebook home window.
B: Log in to Facebook. Click on the bell shaped button at the top left of your Facebook home window.
steps: To check your Facebook feed, the first step is to access the platform by logging in to Facebook with your credentials.
After logging in, you need to navigate to your home page where various icons and buttons are displayed on the top bar.
The bell-shaped button at the top right corner of the home window represents notifications. Clicking this button provides updates from different activities on Facebook, including your feed.
So, the correct choice to check your Facebook feed is "A: Log in to Facebook. Click on the bell shaped button at the top right of your Facebook home window."
